title: Cosplay Guest Judge Announced
content:
JAFAX is excited to announce Ashlee Kalthoff, of Disfusional Studios, as our guest judge for the Cosplay Contest for 2022!

Dis is a classically trained artist from Michigan, a professional cosplayer, and she also enjoys ultra-widescreen PC gaming. Follow her social media for more content, cosplay, gaming, and more.

To find out more about her, her cosplay art, and social links, head over to her bio page!
